name: Peppermint Mocha Lip Balm
description:
The lip balm you all have been craving is here! I'm glad to finally bring one to the Belle Butters shop for you.

This lip balm goes on nice and smooth and is the perfect consistency for your lips to not feel overly greasy, but also provide comfort to dry lips.

You'll feel a cooling sensation from the peppermint oil after first applying but not before smelling the amazing coffee aroma! This will definitely be the stocking stuffer you'll need for loved ones at Christmas and for coffee lovers alike!

Ingredients: beeswax, coffee butter, avocado butter, camellia seed oil, peppermint essential oil, vitamin E (pres).

.15oz

name: Pumpkin Pie Butter
description:
Belle Butters is introducing one of it's seasonal butters, Pumpkin Pie Butter!

I must tell you, I cannot stop smelling this butter! It smells JUST like a freshly made pumpkin pie. This butter embodies everything I love about fall; the earthy scents, pumpkin pie and spices!

In this butter are unrefined shea butter and avocado butters, vitamin E(preservative). I also added a bit of calendula oil and jojoba oil for extra softness and moisture.

The pumpkin pie scent is the cherry on top!

4 and 16oz.

name: Lady Belle Roller Ball
description:
If you're a choosy lover, you may want to try the new Lady Belle signature fragrance in roller ball form!

The fragrance is the same as the solid perfume! 

At the top of this perfume are notes of fruit, both citrus and sweet; think of oranges and coconut. It then graduates into a semi-sweet fragrance of flowers like cherry blossoms mixed with a bit of mint.

Ingredients: special blend of fragrance oils, fractionated coconut oil

10ml

name: Black Currant and Lavender Oil Cleanser
description: You all have requested many times over to make the oil cleanser that I use for myself available to you for purchase and it's here! The Black Currant & Lavender Oil Cleanser is a powerful oil cleanser to use for your oil cleansing method. To make it even more beneficial, I have included 1 pore cleansing pad with the oil. The pore cleansing pad helps the oils to penetrate deeper, digging the gunk out of your pores. The result is smaller pores, smoother and clearer skin. Black currant oil and carrot oil help speed up cell regeneration while lavender and more fights acne. The oil cleansing method reigns superior over detergent based cleansers because of its ability to help normalize the skin (no more excessive oiliness) and promotes a more even skin tone. The oil cleansing method requires patience. If this is your first time trying the oil cleansing method, you may experience a breakout within the first two weeks. This is completely normal as your skin is purging a lot of gunk that your normal cleanser was not removing. Past this two week period, you should experience less breakout and clearer skin. Directions for use are included on the label. You'll be using a dime sized amount of product, a little goes a long way. 2fl oz should last on average 2-3 months. Limit use of the pore cleansing pad to 2-3 times a week. Never use the pore cleansing pad for 2 consecutive days in a row. Overuse can result in aggravated skin. On the days you will not use the cleansing pad, just simply massage your skin with the cleansing oil, steam and remove excess. Ingredients: grapeseed oil, sweet almond oil, black currant oil, carrot oil, lavender essential oil 2fl oz, comes with 1 pore cleansing pad. Additional pore cleansing pads can be purchased by copying and pasting this link in your browser http://www.bellebutters.com/product/cleansing-pad

name: Cleansing Pad
description:
Because two is better than one!

Need an additional pore cleansing pad to get the job done quicker? Here ya go!

name: The FNC Masque
description:
The FNC (Face/Neck/Chest) or Face & Décolleté masque is here!

I wanted to bring a luxury item to the Belle Butters line to give you the ultime at-home spa experience. This clay masque has the texture of a mousse and the application is effortless. Ingredients like sea buckthorn give this clay masque it's color and eucalyptus gives your skin a tingling feeling!

The combined ingredients of this masque deliver amazing benefits like:
Gentle cleanser for the skin (pulls every single blackhead out)
Gently exfoliates
Improves skin circulation
Hydrating
Cell turnover
Anti-inflammatory
Antioxidants & more!

Ingredients: kaolin clay, arnica creme(water, cocoa butter, mango butter, arnica extract, arnica oil, chamomile extract, comfrey extract, rose extract, tamanu oil, pumpkin seed oil, rosehip seed oil, vegetable glycerin), sea buckthorn oil, eucalyptus essential oil, natural preservatives

Directions: Perform a patch test on the skin before use. Apply the masque to the desired area. Do not let the masque stay on the skin for more than 5 minutes. Remove with lukewarm water and pat dry. If needed, use a dark towel as this may stain.

Recommended use: 2-3 times a week.

5oz

name: Loc Lovin' Gellie
description:
We're expanding the Belle Butters line to include those with locs!

Introducing the Loc Lovin' Gellie, an all natural twisting gellie that contains no petroleum or alcohol.

I built this gellie on a base of castor oil and castor wax and added ingredients that are essential to hair health and for great looking roots! The macadamia nut oil will definitely keep the frizzies at bay and the green tea extract will help strengthen the roots. 

This gellie provides a fantastic hold without causing any buildup.
It is suggested that this gellie be used on the new growth that is to be twisted and not the entire loc itself!

Customers have also used this to lay their edges down, for wash-n-go styles and to seal their ends! The uses are limitless!

And remember, a little goes a long way.

Ingredients: castor wax, castor oil, macadamia nut oil, jojoba oil, rosemary oil, green tea extract, frankincense essential oil, vitamin E (pres)

4oz./8oz.

name: Unyevu Butter
description:
Unyevu (oon-yay-vu) is Swahili for moisture.

This awesome butter is filled with ingredients that will help promote moisturized skin, flexible skin and healthier hair.

I used a super combo of butters: shea, mango and avocado. I then added neem oil which helps relieved an irritated scalp, thickens hair and removes dandruff. Apricot kernel oil is rich in vitamins A and E and sunflower oil retains moisture and is an emollient for the skin.

The neem oil in this butter has a very nutty scent, paired with the fragrance oil used, the overall smell is earthy, a little musky and ending with amber.

Default price is for 4oz

4oz., 16oz


Ingredients: shea butter, raw pressed mango butter, refined avocado butter, apricot kernel oil, neem oil, sunflower oil, fragrance, vitamin E (preservative)

name: Premium Whipped Shea Butter - 8oz and 16oz
description:
Protect, repair and strengthen your tresses with this amazingly fluffy whipped shea butter.

Moisturize and condition your body and nails with this easy to apply butter that goes on smoothly like silk!

Treat your hair and body with the best natural ingredients like shea butter, calendula oil and coconut oil.

Get ready for softer hair and skin and strong nails!

NEW! SCENTS AVAILABLE!
You can now add a scent to your butter at no additional cost. Please choose your scent from the drop down menu.

Please note that your scented butter is made to order. Please allow additional time for your butter to be made and shipped.

Ingredients: shea butter, calendula oil, extra virgin coconut oil, jojoba oil, brahmi oil, neem oil, henna oil, rosemary oil, sweet almond oil, chamomile flower extract, lemon, vitamin E(preservative)

Default item price shown is for 8oz Premium Whipped Shea Butter.


Please choose the proper size and/or scent from the drop down menu when making your purchase. Please note that the 2oz size has it's own listing here (please copy and paste link) http://bellebutters.bigcartel.com/product/premium-whipped-shea-butter-2oz

name: Unyevu Butter 32oz
description:
The 32oz Unyevu Butter is here!! So many of you love this top seller for your hair and body care needs. You loved it so much that the 16oz sized jar just wasn't enough! I couldn't do a vat, as some has suggested, but the next best thing was a 32oz jar. 

This item automatically ships via USPS Priority Mail domestically and First Class International Mail.

name: Double Agent Butter
description:
This amazingly creamy butter is filled with wonderful goodies for the body and hair!

Avocado, Shea and Acai* Butters make up the creamy base for this butter.

I added Camelina and Cranberry Seed Oil both of which are high in Omega fatty acids 3-9.  This butter is excellent for eczema and psoriasis sufferers, improves elasticity of the skin, provides a protective coating for hair follicles and is high in tocopherols (naturally occurring preservatives).

This double agent super butter is sure to maintain moisture, absorbs quickly and lasts!

Coconut scented.

Remember a little goes a long way!

*The butter will have little black specks. These are from the Acai Butter and are totally harmless!

Ingredients: shea butter, avocado butter, acai butter, cranberry seed oil, camelina seed oil, jojoba oil, fragrance, vitamin E(preservative)

Default price is for 4oz.

4oz, 16oz

name: Neutralizing Butter for Oily Skin
description:
Oily T-Zone sufferers unite!

I made this butter because I, am a sufferer of a very oily T-Zone. For years, I've been trying this and that and the other to try and get the balance I need. After doing some research, I tried to make it for myself and it has been tested an approved!

You no longer have to wake up in the morning to a slick forehead, oily nose or a greasy chin. This butter will neutralize your t-zone, making it significantly less oily. It will also soften up the texture of your skin.

Using it is easy! This is designated for a night-time routine that is quick and easy. Directions for use will be included in your order.

This butter is very creamy and a little goes a long way!

This butter includes essential ingredients for your skin like:
Avocado butter: replaces moisture lost
Blueberry butter: antioxidant
Aloe vera gel: moisture
Castor oil: reduces oiliness
Charcoal powder: draws out impurities

4oz.


Ingredients: refined avocado butter, blueberry butter, activated charcoal powder, grapeseed oil, aloe vera gel, lavender oil, castor oil, jojoba oil, vitamin E

name: Shea-Mango Fluffy Butter
description:
This fluffy butter is filled with goodness!

Shea butter moisturizes and heals with it's naturally occurring vitamin E.

Raw pressed mango butter improves the suppleness of skin and absorbs quickly.

Jojoba oil maintains moisture by allowing the skin to breath freely and vegetable glycerin is a great humectant that draws in moisture. Castor oil works to lock-in moisture and help relieve itchy skin.

Fragranced with a warm vanilla scent.

Remember a little goes a long way!

Ingredients: raw pressed mango butter, shea butter, castor oil, jojoba oil, vegetable glycerin, fragrance, vitamin E(preservative).

2oz, 4oz

name: Avo-Cocoa Facial Polish
description:
NEW!

The Avo-Cocoa Facial Polish is a gentle exfoliator using walnut shells.
I stuck with some tried and true ingredients to give this product a luxury feel, in addition to awesome benefits for the skin. 

Avocado Butter and Cocoa Butter - moisturize, improve elasticity of the skin and help diminish scars.
Walnut Shells - gentle exfoliation
Black Currant Oil and Carrot Seed Oil - increases renewal of skin cells
Jojoba Oil and Honey - moisturizes and keeps your skin glowing!

Use: once a week-twice a week

Do not use on cuts or burns and keep away from eyes.

Directions: A little goes a long way. Massage into skin, focusing on areas where skin is dry/peeling. Wipe away with a warm towel. 

Ingredients: refined avocado butter, cocoa butter, walnut shell, black currant oil, carrot seed oil, jojoba oil, raw honey, vitamin E (preservative)

8oz.

name: Mint Chocolate Butter
description:
Are you trying to fight back the urge from tearing into that box of Girl Scout cookies? You know the kind, chocolaty and minty that taste oh so great when you put them in your mouth.

Fight your cravings with a nice whiff of Belle Butters Mint Chocolate Butter for Hair and Body.

The chocolatey scent of cocoa butter is sure to satisfy any craving. topped off with a hint of peppermint oil for even more decadence!

This is a great alternative if you want to try something other than a shea butter based product! This butter is much lighter and works great on hair and the body.

This butter goes on like silk and remember a little goes a long way!

Ingredients: cocoa butter, olive butter, macadamia oil, peppermint oil, vitamin E(preservative)

2oz, 4oz, 8oz

name: Shea and Matcha Green Tea Butter
description:
The newest addition to the Belle Butters line of butters is the Shea and Matcha Green Tea Butter.

We all know how beneficial green tea is for our diet. Green tea is also great for your skin and hair, even when it's used topically!

Matcha green tea does the following:
-Block UV rays
-Inhibits inflammation and stops the damage done to your DNA (skin cells)
-Soothes dandruff and psoriasis
-Strengthens and softens hair while preventing split ends
-It has been found to stimulate hair growth, but we'll let you test that one out for yourself ;)

8oz., 16oz.

Ingredients: shea butter, matcha green tea butter, avocado oil, rosemary oil, vitamin E(preservative)

name: Orange Dream Cream Butter
description:
Remember that Nestle summertime treat of orange sherbet Push-Pops?

Take a step back into your childhood as the Belle Butters Orange Dream Cream Butter for Hair and Body fills your nose with the wonderful smell of orange sherbet.

I couldn't resist the attempt of whipping up this butter. It's not too fruity or strong, just right. When I whip this my kitchen is filled with the fresh citrus scent.

Orange is a natural exfoliant and vitamin C keeps skin looking young and smooth. It's aromatherapeutic qualities will brighten your mood.

I added a few oils to this butter for creaminess and of course for extra moisture.

Your hair will shine all day long when you use this butter! The smell doesn't stick around for long in your hair if you have a sensitive nose.

Remember a little goes a long way!

Ingredients: shea butter, orange butter, jojoba oil, extra virgin coconut oil, extra virgin olive oil, sweet almond oil, vitamin E(preservative)

2oz, 8oz, 16oz

name: Mango Moisture Butter for Face
description:
This moisturizer lasts all day!

Scented with calming lavender, it is present while applying to the skin but the scent then quickly fades away.

Unlike heavy moisturizers, Mango Moisture Butter is so light that you're able to apply your make-up immediately after use.

Does your hubby or special little guy in your life have dry skin? Mango Moisture Butter isn't just for us ladies. Men love it too!

Sweet Almond Oil is easily absorbed by the skin, doesn't clog pores and leaves it supple.

Grapeseed Oil combats dryness, soothes irritating skin and aides in preventing breakouts.

Ingredients: raw pressed mango butter, sweet almond oil, grapeseed oil, lavender, vitamin E(preservative)

2oz, 4oz

name: Pumpkin Pie Butter 32oz
description: Same awesomeness, bigger size! The 32oz is now available to everyone without a custom order request!

name: Silky Outdoor Tanning Butter
description:
Tired of using tanning lotions that leave you feeling dried out? Belle Butters Silky Outdoor Tanning Butter will be sure to leave you completely moisturized after sun bathing for your summer glow.

It's as simple as applying it to your skin (remember a little goes a long way) and having no worries about needing to rehydrate your skin when you're finished! This butter absorbs quickly, is non-greasy and leaves your skin feeling and looking luxurious. This butter is incredibly silky.

Your sun protection comes in the form of shea butter, mango butter, wheat germ oil, and rice bran oil (this oil also smooths out wrinkles). The ingredients used in this butter have an SPF between 10-15. 


Please store in a cool place.

Directions for use: Apply to clean and dry skin prior to going outdoors.

8oz.

Ingredients: shea butter, raw pressed mango butter, cocoa butter, hemp butter, extra virgin coconut oil, wheat germ oil, rice bran oil, fragrance, vitamin E(preservative)

name: Dous Te Bath and Body Oil
description: Dous Te (doos tay) is Swahili for Sweet Tea. I'm so pleased to introduce bath/body oils to the Belle Butter's line of products. Smooth this oil on at any time. This oil is surprisingly light and absorbs right into your skin. It's perfect for the summer. Treat yourself to an at-home hot soak in the tub and add this as an aide to help soften and smooth your skin while you bathe. The Dous Te B&B Oil is comprised of various fruit and nut oils like jojoba, shea, moringa and wheat germ oil that has been infused with rhubarb, lemon peel, chamomile flowers and rosemary. All are extremely beneficial for keeping the skin supple and for improving elasticity. Ingredients: sunflower oil, apricot kernel oil, shea oil, sweet almond oil, wheat germ oil, jojoba oil, extra virgin olive oil, calendula oil, moringa oil, osmanthus oil, rhubarb, lemon, chamomile, rosemary, vitamin E *note: there may be small pieces of chamomile flower in this oil. Please select 2fl oz or 12fl oz from drop down menu when adding item to your cart. Pin It

name: Lady Belle Solid Perfume
description: Expanding the line of Belle Butters, I introduce to you Lady Belle. This moniker, recently given to me by a good friend who plans on calling me this…forever. At the top of this solid perfume are notes of fruit, both citrus and sweet; think of oranges and coconut. It then graduates into a semi-sweet fragrance of flowers like cherry blossoms. It finally ends on a soft note of mint. With it's compact size and easy application tube, this is perfect for travel or small enough to put in your clutch when you want to refresh your fragrance while out on the town. Ingredients:beeswax, orange butter, mango oil, apricot kernel oil, fragrance oils .15 oz. Pin It

name: Premium Whipped Shea Butter - 2oz
description:
2oz sized Premium Whipped Shea Butter is a separate listing for shipping purposes.

Fragrance option is not available for 2oz size. It is not an option for custom order.

Ingredients: shea butter, calendula oil, extra virgin coconut oil, jojoba oil, brahmi oil, neem oil, henna oil, rosemary oil, sweet almond oil, chamomile flower extract, lemon, vitamin E(preservative)
